attributes.action: order a full and comprehensive independent public inquiry into the failure of Mid Staffordshire NHS Foundation Trust to ensure the safety of its patients in accordance with Health and Safety Laws in the years 2005-2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Further to the Healthcare Commission summary report dated March 2009 'Investigation, into Mid Staffordshire NHS Foundation Trust' which highlighted gross failures in care standards and practices at Mid Staffordshire NHS Foundation Trust, we believe that an independent public inquiry must take place, to determine who was responsible for the negligence that contributed to the deaths of patients within the trust, and to hold to account those responsible for failing to implement safe standards of working and practice in respect to all relevant Health and Safety laws.
